title: Support
title-discreption: Need help with your Gemsy account? Have questions about how to use our platform? We're here to help.
f1-discreption: How do I reset my password?
f1-paragraph: To reset your password, you can click the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. This will send you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
f2-discreption: How do I report a review?
f2-paragraph: Click the flag icon next to any review to report it to our moderation team.
